title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, wrapping the REST API with idiomatic Python helpers.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers, published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model inside Discord.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop GUI for Ollama with chat history and model switching.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of shell scripts and GitHub Actions to automate pulling, tagging and benchmarking Ollama models.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom integration exposing Ollama as a conversation agent for voice assistants.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-chat
summary: React-based chat interface packaged as a static PWA that can be served from any Ollama host.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated list of community-contributed Modelfile recipes for popular open-source LLMs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation demo combining Ollama with ChromaDB for question-answering over documents.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama binaries and module to the NixOS ecosystem for declarative deployments.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration that listens for mentions and replies using a configurable Ollama model.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing a chat interface and REST endpoints backed by Ollama, plus admin analytics.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar utility for starting/stopping Ollama and switching models from the toolbar.
